quote: Things conceived by minds and made by hands can never be quite the same, even if they try their best to be identical, because they're never the same from day to day or even moment to moment.
quote_letters: THINGS CONCEIVED BY MINDS AND MADE BY HANDS CAN NEVER BE QUITE THE SAME EVEN IF THEY TRY THEIR BEST TO BE IDENTICAL BECAUSE THEYRE NEVER THE SAME FROM DAY TO DAY OR EVEN MOMENT TO MOMENT
